item.title: About
item.author: thinkuldeep@gmail.com (Kuldeep Singh)
item.description: üì® Contact Me üìÉ My Resume üéóÔ∏è Communities I Support üõü My Life Mantras üó£Ô∏è What others says about me üê¶‚Äçüî•Ô∏è My Inventions üìöÔ∏è My Books üèÜÔ∏è My Awards üëâ Few words about Kuldeep! Kuldeep has built his career empowering businesses with the Tech@Core approach. He has incubated IoT and AR/VR Centres of Excellence with a strong focus on building development practices such as CICD, TDD, automation testing and XP around new technologies.

item.title: Open-sources and Apps
item.author: thinkuldeep@gmail.com (Kuldeep Singh)
item.description: Gen AI Hands On Practices Google Colab Hands-on practice for developing Gen AI applications, and understanding the concepts. ‚òû Github ‚òû Learn More SSO Proxy A lightweight proxy tool for accessing APIs and websites that require SSO authentication. It uses Puppeteer to open a browser window for login and then reuses the authenticated cookies to access the proxied URL. This tool is particularly helpful for: Showcasing integration with portal APIs that require SSO (before SSO is actually set up).

item.title: Patent Granted: Spatially interact with 3D Model from a 2D app in the smart glasses
item.author: thinkuldeep@gmail.com (Kuldeep Singh)
item.description: üí° Innovation often starts with solving everyday problems. While working on XR solutions and building operating systems for smart glasses, we solved one such challenge. Earlier, with our patented AppSpace method, we enabled rendering a phone‚Äôs 2D apps in 3D on smart glasses. But we found a gap ‚Äî there was no direct way for a 2D app (like Chrome) to interact with 3D spatial content. üèÖ Thrilled to share that our solution to this is now recognized with a U.

item.title: Patents
item.author: thinkuldeep@gmail.com (Kuldeep Singh)
item.description: This listing includes patent applications that are pending as well as patents that have already been granted by the United States Patent and Trademark Office (USPTO). CONCURRENT RENDERING OF CANVASES FOR DIFFERENT APPS AS PART OF 3D SIMULATION This invention focuses on rendering multiple 2D mobile apps simultaneously in XR devices, arranged within a 3D spatial layout. This browser does not support PDFs. Please download the PDF to view it: Download PDF.

item.title: Books
item.author: thinkuldeep@gmail.com (Kuldeep Singh)
item.description: üìï Exploring the Metaverse Redefining Reality in the Digital Age “Exploring the Metaverse” is a comprehensive guide to the metaverse, the future state of the internet. Prepare yourself for what’s ahead by understanding the opportunities and challenges of the metaverse. This book calls us to action, emphasizing that its evolution is in our hands. You can find a detailed synopsis of the book here. Available globally on Amazon and BPB Online as both paperback and eBook.

item.title: Patent Granted: Streaming of Composite Alpha Blended AR/MR Video
item.author: thinkuldeep@gmail.com (Kuldeep Singh)
item.description: üí° Innovation Often Begins with Solving Everyday Problems In our daily work, we regularly develop methods, processes, features, or approaches to address specific challenges. While these may initially seem like routine solutions, some of them quietly evolve into true innovations‚Äîoften without us realizing it at the time. üèÖ I‚Äôm excited to share that one such innovation has now been recognized with a U.S. Patent! Patent No : US 12,323,679 B2 This patent, titled _“Streaming of Composite Alpha Blended AR/MR Video” granted to Lenovo, introduces a novel method for web-based AR and MR streaming‚Äîallowing mixed reality experiences from a headset to be cast directly to a web browser, along with the phone screen.

item.title: Patent Granted: Square orientation for stereoscopic rendering
item.author: thinkuldeep@gmail.com (Kuldeep Singh)
item.description: In our day-to-day work, we often create methods, processes, approaches, or features to address specific needs and challenges. Sometimes, these solutions turn into significant innovations, even if we don’t immediately recognize them as such. This is also true in our professional work setup, where we may invent without fully realizing it. I’m thrilled to share that a new patent has been granted to Lenovo for their groundbreaking work in the ThinkReality XR product line, and I am honored to be a co-inventor on this work.

item.title: My thoughtworkings from five thoughtful years
item.author: thinkuldeep@gmail.com (Kuldeep Singh)
item.description: Thoughtworks is celebrating its 30th year in industry, and I have completed five years here, and to celebrate this, I have compiled thoughts from thoughtworkers, and published them as an ebook. I am grateful for the wealth of knowledge and experiences shared by my colleagues. These thoughts have resonated with me and shaped my journey within the organization and life. I am excited to launch the ebook with this post. I believe this compilation of thoughts will not only serve as a personal reflection but also as a valuable resource for others on their own professional journeys.
